gpt3_output.patient: Recently, I am experiencing Acid reflux and Burning sensation behind the breastbone.
gpt3_output.doctor: The symptoms you are describing are suggestive of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). GERD is a condition in which stomach acid and other contents of the stomach reflux back up into the esophagus. This can cause a burning sensation in the chest or throat. Other symptoms of GERD may include difficulty swallowing, coughing, and wheezing. If you are experiencing any of these symptoms, I recommend that you see a doctor for further evaluation.
